title: Surinder talks about how ignorance and misinformation can cause people to hide their identity

media:group.media:title: Surinder talks about how ignorance and misinformation can cause people to hide their identity
media:group.media:description:
Surinder, a “Being Asian in America” documentary participant, talks about his experience working with youth who have decided to give up their Sikh identity in order to fit in and avoid contentious encounters. 

This video is part of our “Being Asian in America” project. 
Watch the full documentary here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LIIvqJDv6_4 
For more on the project, visit https://www.pewresearch.org/BeingAsianInAmerica
